Summary: If you love Cappuccion's or Latte's this is for you!
text: The Illy Issimo Cappuccino drink is smooth and refreshing. A wonderful cold 8.45 oz cappuccino that is made with lowfat milk and cocoa and is only 100 calories.  The drink is made from All natural with 100% percent Arabica coffee and sweetened with beet sugar. I truly enjoyed this and can't wait to try the other flavors from Illy Issimo.
